description: Enable interaction with Slack workspaces as a user.

slackToken.description: The User OAuth Token for Slack, starting with 'xoxp-'

slackTeamId.description: The team ID for the Slack workspace, starting with 'T'

capabilities.name: slack_list_channels
capabilities.description: List public channels in the workspace with pagination

capabilities.name: slack_post_message
capabilities.description: Post a new message to a Slack channel

capabilities.name: slack_reply_to_thread
capabilities.description: Reply to a specific message thread in Slack

capabilities.name: slack_add_reaction
capabilities.description: Add a reaction emoji to a message

capabilities.name: slack_get_channel_history
capabilities.description: Get recent messages from a channel

capabilities.name: slack_get_thread_replies
capabilities.description: Get all replies in a message thread

capabilities.name: slack_get_users
capabilities.description: Get a list of all users in the workspace with their basic profile information

capabilities.name: slack_get_user_profile
capabilities.description: Get detailed profile information for a specific user
